original_text: This made the sailors even more afraid. Jonah had already told them that he was running away from the Lord. So they said to him, ‘Why did you do a thing like that?’
korean_text: 자기가 여호와의 얼굴을 피함인 줄을 그들에게 말하였으므로 무리가 알고 심히 두려워하여 이르되 네가 어찌하여 그렇게 행하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: This made the sailors even more afraid.
that he was running away from the Lord.
'Why did you do a thing like that?'
